name: Patchwork
description: In the long-awaited digital adaptation of Uwe Rosenberg's Patchwork, players patch their way to victory using fabric pieces of assorted sizes, colors, and buttons.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I am having a lot of issues with this one running on Windows 10. Not sure if it's just me or others are having the problems.
